item.title: Being Misunderstood
item.description: It sucks. Link to heading You won’t know and will not have the chance to know what they think of you. You think you might be doing someone a favor, but another person would think otherwise, which makes you feel ashamed. They assume you have other motives than what you portray, and what they come up with is miles apart! What’s worse is when there are a lot of them!
